channel.title: Are forum games allowed?
channel.description:
So if we all use English to the best of our abilities, can we have some forum games in this board. Nothing over the top or lame. Like there was one on moparscape or mitb not really sure where you predict the next person who is going to post. I really liked that game and never got a chance to play since I really wasn't that well known and still that :o
Since we are small enough we can do it successfully? Also do post on this board count toward your post count? if it does, can we change that? :D
If not, disregard this message and go easy on that hate lol

item.title: Are forum games allowed?
item.dc:creator: @triston001 triston001
item.description:
@triston001 wrote:

[quote=“xx matty xx, post:7, topic:456117”][quote author=Tom link=topic=559058.msg4087634#msg4087634 date=1346020277]
We’ve decided that we’ll give this a test run, all posts go into the “Forum Games” board. Have fun.
[/quote]well that was unexpected…[/quote]
lolol

Read full topic
